city_task.description: Run away from your pursuers, try to talk to them, or shoot them. The intensity of pursuit will dramatically increase if you start shooting.

StreetSense is a new lens on the radial menu. It allows your androids to perceive subtle opportunities around them. At the moment, you're looking for somewhere to hide. You'll probably need some humans to help you.
city_task.strategy_tip: With StreetSense on, you'll see a variety of people you can interact with. You probably only have time to speak to a couple of them. Hover the icons to see which you prefer, and {0} it. When you're looking at things broadly like this, that's much easier to do on the map view. Press {1} to switch to it.

city_task.description: The handbook gains new entries as they are relevant to your situation. You can see the count rise when new unread entries are added.
city_task.strategy_tip: It's not expected that you read them all, but it's good to know they're there. Please use {0} to go to the handbook screen (or click the icon in the top-right header), and then click into any of the entries.

city_task.description: StreetSense is currently the most useful lens on your radial wheel, but that won't always be so.
city_task.strategy_tip: For now, you capture new android bodies by finding them in StreetSense. {0} the one(s) you want. If you prefer to see enemy positions on the map, switch back to the Versatile lens.

city_task.description: Feel free to switch to the map and back as needed, but finding that last building is hard from the main view.
city_task.strategy_tip: The city map allows you to investigate in seconds what otherwise would take longer. Press {0} and try investigating at least once from that vantage.

city_task.line_2: Claim your place in the city.
city_task.description: If this city is an immovable object, you will be the unstoppable force. It all starts with this tower. You have everything you need.
city_task.strategy_tip: To build a structure, use the Build icon, shown at the top right of the radial menu. You can also press {0} to toggle in and out of build mode. Find a highlighted building for the tower; if no nearby buildings are highlighted, scroll around. Don't worry about gathering your androids before construction -- the tower should finally end this relentless pursuit, and you'll have more time then.
